title: A Blog of Note
content:
Did you guys know that [James Mosley](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018004720/http:/typophile.com/wiki/James%20Mosley) has a blog?!  
 [http://typefoundry.blogspot.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018004720/http:/typefoundry.blogspot.com/ "http://typefoundry.blogspot.com/")

And the content, not surprisingly, is top-notch.

(Thanks to Gerald Lange for the ref.)
